name: Potent Potables Quiz | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is mixed with vodka to make a Moscow Mule?
questions.explanation:
Ginger Beer.

	It's got a kick. Some books call for lemon juice, while others call for lime juice but all Moscow mules call for vodka and ginger beer.

questions.text: Apart from wheat and rye, from which vegetable is vodka traditionally made?
questions.explanation:
Potato.

	It is also made from wheat and other grains.

questions.text: Which of these nations comes to mind when you mention vodka?
What juice is combined with vodka to make a Greyhound?
Vodka, orange juice and Galliano make up what drink?
Vodka and Kahlua is called a what?
A gimlet can be made with vodka---- True or False?
questions.explanation:
True.

	Gin is the more common variant, but some modern recipes (1995 and more recent) use vodka instead.
